Blackfang sat down, then took out his energy shotgun and started 
cleaning it carefully. He didn't think this would be much use against 
Unicron, but he didn't want to leave it to chance either.

As he cleaned his weapon, he thought of Kitkat. He wondered just how 
much she remembered him...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> She sat down and looked up at Cooley. "So, my lord, when will we 
> engage in your brilliant plans?" she said with a smile. So far, she 
> still had her Matrix holders intact. She had given one to Cooley, 
but 
> the other two she knew of were still connected to her spark. Hence 
> her thoughts that the Matrix hated her.
